mapper.select: SELECT u.factory_id, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'OK' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ok_count, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'NG' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ng_count FROM ${sfaas.db.schema}.user u JOIN ${sfaas.db.schema}.battery b ON u.factory_id = b.factory_id WHERE u.factory_id = #{factoryId} GROUP BY u.factory_id

SELECT u.factory_id, COUNT(*) AS totalCount, DATE_FORMAT(create_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:00:00') AS filterGroup FROM ${sfaas.db.schema}.user u JOIN ${sfaas.db.schema}.battery b ON u.factory_id = b.factory_id WHERE u.factory_id = #{factoryId} AND create_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL 3 HOUR GROUP BY u.factory_id, filterGroup ORDER BY filterGroup ASC
